project.title: Module 1: Interaction Model (SME & OKC)
project.description: Understand the roles and responsibilities of a Subject Matter expert and Operational key contact in delivering business results under the new Process-based Organization. Learn how these 2 key players should interact with the other teams to deliver business goals.
project.keywords: SME, Subject Matter expert, OKC, Operational Key Contact, Interaction Model, A2R
